content: Hello mods. I did the thing on Reach where you search for a person's name and you tag who they support, what issues matter to them, etc. I entered my girlfriend's name as a test. She has never signed up to volunteer and has never donated. She now got a text from the campaign today, about 2 months later. Is this info collected used for text banking? Or just unrelated and somehow she just got signed up ?
Hi <@958039986672910376> I just went through the Reach re-training today and it was reiterated that they are not collecting this info- so that was coincidental
Wow, very very coincidental. I have no idea how else they would have gotten her name and info.
The lists for call and text campaigns are based on voter registration info, if she's friends with you I'm assuming she's registered to vote?
That's how. The campaign pulls voter data every day

It's also how we will be able to whittle down lists as people vote and those votes are counted. Apparently they can pull the data daily and are updating accordingly (this is now mixing info I've gotten from phone bank trainings with the Reach team training, but there you have it)
Very cool. thanks for the info, i appreciate it !
